questions.question: Is your mood mostly cheerful and upbeat?
Can the offense inflicted on you be experienced as acutely or even more strongly after a long time?
Deep emotions make you cry?
At the end of any work, do you have any doubts about the quality of its execution?
Does any new event in your life scare you?
Do you have mood swings from very happy to very sad?
Do you constantly strive to be the center of attention?
Are you often annoyed and dissatisfied with your surroundings?
Are you a reserved, taciturn person?
Are you able to admire something to the point of oblivion?
Do you infect people with optimism?
Do you have a hard time forgetting minor grievances?
Are you a sensitive, soft-hearted person?
When you drop a message in the mailbox, do you check whether it has dropped or not, whether it is stuck in the slot?
Are you ready to avenge personal infidelity?
Were you afraid of thunderstorms (or dogs) as a child?
Do you always strive to maintain order in everything?
Is your mood constantly fluctuating for no particular reason?
Can your joyful mood be abruptly replaced by deep sadness?
Are you a hot-tempered person?
Are you usually in a depressed mood?
Is your perception of artistic works extremely sharpened?
Are you constantly busy with business?
Do the insults inflicted on you cause a hidden rage in you?
Can you kill a live bird?
Does it annoy you when an item is not in its proper place?
Are you afraid to stay home alone?
Do you have causeless mood swings?
Do you strive to be the first in your professional activity?
Do you get angry easily?
Are you capable of being cheerful for a long time?
Do you have a feeling of exuberant delight against the background of a bad mood?
Are your contacts with people easy and diverse?
Are you impressionable as a child?
Does the sight of blood scare you?
Can your talkativeness be replaced by complete isolation at the moment?
Are you an ambitious person at heart?
Are you afraid to go down to a dark cellar, enter an empty unlit room?
Do you prefer thorough and slow work?
Sometimes you are a sociable person, and sometimes you can't get a word out of you?
Do you feel great on stage?
Do you find it difficult to control your strong desires?
Do you find life unbearably hard?
Is it easy for you to pretend to be ill so that you don't have to go to work or study?
Even if you fail, do you still have a sense of humor and optimism?
Is it easy for you to make peace with a person who has offended you greatly?
Do you feel a sense of compassion for stray animals?
Do you constantly worry that something will happen to you or your family?
Does your mood fluctuate depending on the weather?
Is it difficult for you to speak at a meeting, make a report, etc. in front of a large audience?
Are you ready to hit a person if they offend you too much?
Do you like being in fun companies?
Are you a romantic person-sometimes full of dreams, sometimes full of sadness?
Is it easy for you to engage in organizational activities?
Can tragic films move you so much that tears come to your eyes?
How long do you remember the critical comments about you?
Are you afraid to walk down a dark street at a late hour?
Do you carefully ensure that every item in your home is in its proper place?
When you go to bed in a good mood, do you often get up in the morning in a depressed, gloomy mood?
Do you take a leading role in any situation?
When you are 'hurt', can you hit?
Do you laugh often?
Does the initiative usually come from you?
Do you really love nature?
Do you strive to restore order everywhere and in everything?
Are you a fearful person?
Does your mood fluctuate under the influence of alcohol?
Do you like to be admired?
Can you use your fists during an argument?
Are you pessimistic about the future?
Are you subject to frequent mood swings from joy to sadness?
Do you create a happy mood in any company?
Are you ready to take revenge even on a strong opponent?
Do you feel strongly about other people's sorrows?
In your school years, did you start a new notebook because of one blot?
Do scary dreams make a strong impression on you?
Can your period of good mood change to apathy for no reason?
Do you become aggressive under the influence of alcohol?
Are you rather taciturn in conversation?
Are you able to captivate others with the originality of your actions and thoughts?
